original_title: Nenhuma Fórmula Para a Contemporânea Visão do Mundo
overview: Carola Brecker is a young writer in crisis. After leaving her husband Mickey, she is hired by the cultural gangster Al Gazarra to write 42 plays about the god Pan, to be staged by the excentric polish director Tadeusz Karkovski.
title: Nenhuma Fórmula Para a Contemporânea Visão do Mundo
